pageContext.claim: “Economic growth has topped 3 percent for two quarters in a row. GDP growth, which is way ahead of schedule under my administration, will be one of America's truly greatest weapons.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump routinely touts quarterly GDP growth of 3 percent, suggesting the figure was unheard of being he took office. But GDP growth has routinely topped 3 percent on a quarterly basis. Most recently, GDP growth hit 3.5 percent in the third quarter of 2016 while Obama was still in office.
